### __Version 1.4__
#### 04-12-2019


_Functionality_

- Changed protein data from InnateDB to StringDB + GO
- Data tab allows for picking direct, first indirect or second indirect datasets.
- Linked preprocessing to this shiny app using YAML configurations

_Fixes_

- Overall stability issues have been fixed

_Other_

- Organized the settings tab into compartments
- Added an experimental settings tab which indicates bugs may appear when used
